name: omp
description:
Challenge your friends and family to beat omp and see who reaches the end first!

omp is a 2D Rhythm Game. Inspired by

a submission to Insane Game Jam where you submit your hardest games!

Get to the end without colliding to the wall and enemies! Any feedbacks are welcomed! If this game reaches 20 plays I will add more levels (and potentially more unique mechanics :D).

PS: All levels are theoretically beatable.

Check this out maybe
